Don't make smokes your story

0:48

Read transcript

Well done! You've taken an important step on the road to becoming smoke-free.

Here you will be able to learn the many benefits of quitting and ways to help you do this.

Let's face it, quitting can be hard and most smokers try a number of times before they finally quit for good.

So don't beat yourself up. take one step at a time. The longer you stay quit, the easier it gets.
